text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Crazy trainer. She should learn when<n>to keep her mouth
shut.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(People have always been such a<n>pain. I can't stand any of
them.)

text_block_list.name: Boy A
text_block_list.text: Your shoes? Oh yeah, I saw 'em! Up<n>in that tree!

text_block_list.name: Boy B
text_block_list.text:
But wait, you can't reach that high.<n>Guess you've just
gotta jump!

text_block_list.name: Girl A
text_block_list.text:
Poor Taishin, stuck sitting all by<n>herself. Who wants to go try
talking to<n>her?

text_block_list.name: Girl B
text_block_list.text:
Ewww, not me! She's so weird!<n>Let's rock-paper-scissors
for it.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Making fun of me and bullying me forthe dumbest reasons. Like I'd everwanna be friends with them.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Every single day was such a pain in<n>the ass. But then... I
found racing.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: It was the only good thing I had.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!

text_block_list.name: Classmate A
text_block_list.text: Whoa, awesome!

text_block_list.name: Classmate B
text_block_list.text: Hey, isn't that... Narita Taishin? That<n>puny loner can run?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So I lived to race. Because by<n>winning, I could leave all the
idiots<n>choking in the dust.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
If I could get away from them all, to<n>the other side of the
finish line... I<n>knew I'd finally be able to breathe<n>easy.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
So I went full sprint ahead. I even<n>imagined going for the
Twinkle Series.<n>But...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Yes! I got first!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, gasp. Crap!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Hey, your name's Narita Taishin,<n>isn't it? I heard you're
going to<n>Tracen Academy in the spring. That<n>true?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I don't see what it has to do with you.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: More like, what does it have to dowith you? You know it's an eliteschool for runners with talent, right?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
What would they want a little runt like<n>you for? You'll never
get in!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I wanted to tell her to shut up, or that<n>I'd show her, or a
million other things<n>that came to mind.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: But even now, I can feel the words<n>still stuck in my throat.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, gasp...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
(Damn... What the hell is going on?<n>How can they be this
much better?!<n>There's not an inch to squeeze<n>through to
the front!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (Tracen Academy... is no joke!)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Gasp, gasp... Agh...

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (Can't breathe...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: (I can't... catch my breath...)

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: No... I'm not letting it end here!

Long after the lights are out for the<n>night, a small shadow
crosses the<n>course. With a gulp, I go to confirm<n>my
suspicions.

Sure enough, it's her again—Narita<n>Taishin— looking
somewhat<n>distressed.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant...

She's clearly on the verge of<n>collapsing. So without second
thought,<n>I call out to her.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Huh? Who the heck are you?
choice_data_list: You're going to get yourself injured.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Get lost. Why would I listen to you?

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Uuugh! I said, beat it! I'm sick of you<n>idiots!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
"Don't be reckless." "It's too<n>dangerous." Well? Go ahead!
I know<n>you're just itching to say it! "Racing<n>isn't for you,"
right?!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
"You're too short!" "You're too frail!"<n>"You're not cut out to
be a racer!"

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: All that junk—I'm sick and tired of<n>hearing it!

Seeing her intensity, I freeze, unsure<n>how to respond.
Bitterly, she<n>continues.

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
Okay?! I don't care what people say!<n>I'm gonna stay right
on the turf! I'll<n>show all you whiny morons!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text:
I'll show you exactly where I should<n>be! And I'll be
laughing when I tell you<n>to shove it from the winner's circle!
The look in her eyes is unmistakable.

It's the unquenchable thirst for<n>victory—a terrible and
unshakable<n>drive.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ah haaaaah! Found youuu, Taishiiiiin!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What are you thinking, staying out<n>this late?! All the lights
are off! It's<n>dangerous!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: Ugh... What the heck are youdoing here?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
What else! I'm here to come get you!<n>I was sooo worried
waiting in the<n>dorm for you, Taishin!

text_block_list.name: Narita Taishin
text_block_list.text: I don't need you to worry about me.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Huh?! H-hey, wait up, Taishiiin!
The course goes quiet, leaving me<n>alone with my thoughts.

The fire in her soul ignites something<n>in me, and my pulse
refuses to slow<n>down.
